title: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to sync a .java file and another resource, the synchronization process fails without any error messages.
OB: When trying to sync a .java file and another resource, the synchronization process fails.
EB: The synchronization process should complete successfully without any errors.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the project that contains a .java file and another resource file.
2. Attempt to sync the .java file and the other resource file using the synchronization feature.
3. Observe that the synchronization process fails and no error messages are displayed.
